page.title: 19LIFE IN BOARDING SCHOOL
page.content: At{Rydal}Prep. School Colwyn Bay each morning starts with the riser at{7.30. Breakfast at{8.00}is followed by registration and a short service of a reading,a hymn and prayers.Each day there are 7 forty minute lessons with mid morning and lunch breaks. At{15.15 lessons are followed by a variety of activities such as swimming,cookery rugby,soccer,hockey,cricket,cubs,craft etc.. Forty minutes is spent quietly reading until tea at{17.30.}After an hour of prep. the pupils go to their boarding houses at{19.00.}There are shoes to be cleaned, clothes and belongings to be tidied and baths to be had before an hour or so of relaxation until bedtime.Boarding school can be great fun _ it is good to have so many friends of your own age as constant companions.It only costs{Â£3 700}to stay for a year!
